ops.name: generate-audit
ops.description: Generate a security audit for your n8n instance.

ops.name: create-credential
ops.description: Creates a credential that can be used by nodes of the specified type.

ops.name: delete-credential
ops.description: Deletes a credential from your instance. You must be the owner of the credentials

ops.name: transfer-credential
ops.summary: Transfer a credential to another project.
ops.description: Transfer a credential to another project.

ops.name: update-credential
ops.description: Updates an existing credential. You must be the owner of the credential.

ops.name: create-data-table
ops.description: Create a new data table in your workspace.

ops.name: delete-data-table
ops.description: Delete a data table. This will also delete all rows in the table.

ops.name: delete-data-table-rows
ops.summary: Delete rows from a data table
ops.description: Delete rows matching filter conditions from a data table. Filter is required to prevent accidental deletion of all data.

ops.name: get-data-table
ops.description: Retrieve a specific data table by ID.

ops.name: get-data-table-rows
ops.summary: Retrieve rows from a data table
ops.description: Query and retrieve rows from a data table with optional filtering, sorting, and pagination.

ops.name: insert-data-table-rows
ops.summary: Insert rows into a data table
ops.description: Insert one or more rows into a data table.

ops.name: list-data-tables
ops.description: Retrieve a list of all data tables with optional filtering, sorting, and pagination.

ops.name: update-data-table
ops.description: Update a data table's name.

ops.name: update-data-table-rows
ops.summary: Update rows in a data table
ops.description: Update rows matching filter conditions in a data table.

ops.name: upsert-data-table-row
ops.summary: Upsert a row in a data table
ops.description: Update an existing row or insert a new one if no row matches the filter conditions.

ops.name: delete-execution
ops.description: Deletes an execution from your instance.

ops.name: get-execution
ops.description: Retrieve an execution from your instance.

ops.name: get-executions
ops.description: Retrieve all executions from your instance.

ops.name: retry-execution
ops.description: Retry an execution from your instance.

ops.name: add-users-to-project
ops.summary: Add one or more users to a project
ops.description: Add one or more users to a project on your instance.

ops.name: change-user-role-in-project
ops.summary: Change a user's role in a project
ops.description: Change a user's role in a project.

ops.name: create-project
ops.description: Create a project on your instance.

ops.name: delete-project
ops.description: Delete a project from your instance.

ops.name: delete-user-from-project
ops.summary: Delete a user from a project
ops.description: Delete a user from a project on your instance.

ops.name: get-projects
ops.description: Retrieve projects from your instance.

ops.name: update-project
ops.description: Update a project on your instance.

ops.name: pull
ops.summary: Pull changes from the remote repository
ops.description: Requires the Source Control feature to be licensed and connected to a repository.

ops.name: create-tag
ops.description: Create a tag in your instance.

ops.name: delete-tag
ops.description: Deletes a tag.

ops.name: get-tag
ops.description: Retrieves a tag.

ops.name: get-tags
ops.description: Retrieve all tags from your instance.

ops.name: update-tag
ops.description: Update a tag.

ops.name: change-role
ops.description: Change a user's global role

ops.name: create-user
ops.description: Create one or more users.

ops.name: delete-user
ops.description: Delete a user from your instance.

ops.name: get-user
ops.description: Retrieve a user from your instance. Only available for the instance owner.

ops.name: get-users
ops.description: Retrieve all users from your instance. Only available for the instance owner.

ops.name: create-variable
ops.description: Create a variable in your instance.

ops.name: delete-variable
ops.description: Delete a variable from your instance.

ops.name: get-variables
ops.description: Retrieve variables from your instance.

ops.name: update-variable
ops.description: Update a variable from your instance.

ops.name: activate-workflow
ops.description: Publish a workflow. In n8n v1, this action was termed activating a workflow.

ops.name: create-workflow
ops.description: Create a workflow in your instance.

ops.name: deactivate-workflow
ops.description: Deactivate a workflow.

ops.name: delete-workflow
ops.description: Delete a workflow.

ops.name: get-workflow
ops.description: Retrieve a workflow.

ops.name: get-workflow-tags
ops.description: Get workflow tags.

ops.name: get-workflow-version
ops.summary: Retrieves a specific version of a workflow
ops.description: Retrieves a specific version of a workflow from workflow history.

ops.name: get-workflows
ops.description: Retrieve all workflows from your instance.

ops.name: transfer-workflow
ops.summary: Transfer a workflow to another project
ops.description: Transfer a workflow to another project

ops.name: update-workflow
ops.description: Update a workflow. If the workflow is published, the updated version will be automatically re-published.

ops.name: update-workflow-tags
ops.description: Update tags of a workflow.
